rules_text:
Menace
[i]Undergrowth[/i] – When Gelspray Kirthik enters or attacks, put X -1/-1 counters onto up to one target creature, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
rules_text2:
Convoke
Lifelink
When Dawnbreaker Lion enters, put a lifelink counter on each creature that convoked it.
